steps.details: Event permits team to confirm actual turnout vs planned capacity and identify unplanned sub-processions.
Coordinate with procession organizers to control pace and routing to avoid bottlenecks.
BMTC to increase frequency on alternate corridors to reduce private vehicle influx.
Position first-aid stations near high-density nodes to respond quickly to incidents.
Place trained marshals along the route to manage pedestrian flows and prevent spill onto roads.

plan.plan_title: Crowd-Vehicle Bottleneck at Bugle Rock–KR Rd

steps.details: Temporarily close the most congested arterial to vehicular traffic and allow pedestrian flow only.
Create dedicated access corridors for emergency vehicles and inform medical teams.
Work with organizers to stagger procession segments to reduce simultaneous density peaks.
Broadcast crowd management instructions and safety messages to maintain calm.
Continuously assess crowd density and open additional dispersal points if needed.

plan.plan_title: Short AQI Spike from Fireworks & Incense

steps.details: Advise elderly and sensitive individuals to avoid exposed zones for the next few hours.
Ask organizers to minimize fireworks near dense crowds and critical infrastructure.
Increase AQI sampling frequency to track spike decay and inform public.
Distribute disposable masks to nearby vulnerable attendees.
Coordinate cleaning to remove burnt residues that may prolong local air quality issues.
